paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper reports a case of hereditary cardiac amyloidosis associated with a Pro24Ser mutation in the TTR gene, detailing individual patient information and penetrance data.

patients.demographics: 60-year-old Japanese male (proband), third son (age not specified)
patients.phenotype: Isolated cardiac amyloidosis for the proband; unaffected for the son

individual_records.phenotype_details: Cardiac amyloidosis with severe asymmetric left ventricular hypertrophy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: DNA sequence analysis demonstrated a TTR C70T (Pro24Ser) heterozygous mutation.
Further genotyping of TTR of the family members of our patient revealed that his third son has the identical mutation.

functional_data.summary: The Pro24Ser mutation is associated with cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation segregates with disease in the proband and is present in an unaffected family member.
variants.additional_notes: This is the first reported case of this mutation in Japan.
key_quotes: We report a case of isolated cardiac amyloidosis associated with a Pro24Ser mutation in TTR, which is the first case reported in Japan.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
